definition: to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]

sentences.english: But many do mislead (men) by their appetites unchecked by knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 有许多人，必因自己的私欲，而无知地使别人迷误。

sentences.english: Why harm the child’s future for such a selfish desire?
sentences.chinese: 为什么要为了如此的一己私欲而损害孩子的未来呢？

sentences.english: If you didn't have the internal desire, the temptation could not attract you.
sentences.chinese: 如果你没有私欲，没有诱惑能吸引你。

sentences.english: He exploited his authority personal gratification .
sentences.chinese: 他利用职权来满足个人的私欲。

sentences.english: They only attempt is to satisfy their private interest and benefit of the party.
sentences.chinese: 他们只企图于满足他们的私欲和政党利益。

sentences.english: It cannot be denied that there are certain villains who want to take advantage of others and abuse dancing.
sentences.chinese: 不可否认，也有些坏人滥用跳舞之机以图私欲。

sentences.english: Siddhartha described to Govinda how he had moved away from selfish thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 悉达多向葛文达描述他如何摆脱了私欲。

sentences.english: Not in the lust of concupiscence, even as the Gentiles which know not God
sentences.chinese: 不放纵私欲的邪情，像那不认识神的外邦人。

sentences.english: Happiness is about satisfying our needs and desires.
They are looking for a god who can satisfy their own selfish desires.
sentences.chinese: 大家要找的只是能满足自己私欲的神。

sentences.english: He was dominated by greedy egotism.
sentences.chinese: 他被贪婪的私欲所左右。

sentences.english: Sometimes we use other people to try to get it for ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 有的时候我们利用他人满足私欲。

sentences.english: But put ye on the Lord Jesus Christ, and make not provision for the flesh, to fulfil the lusts thereof.
sentences.chinese: 总要披戴主耶稣基督，不要为肉体安排，去放纵私欲。

sentences.english: Cheng big scold Tang Li hurt in order to own the slow-breeding tang sugar.
sentences.chinese: 程超群骂唐力为了自己的一已私欲而害了唐糖。

sentences.english: No man can pray scripturally who prays selfishly.
sentences.chinese: 发自私欲的祷告不会是合乎圣经的祷告。

sentences.english: He wants to deprive all his fellows of the right to act in order to reserve this privilege for himself alone.
sentences.chinese: 他想要剥夺所有人行动的权力，只为满足其一己私欲。

definition: everything for self and selfish profit (idiom); with no regard for others/selfish/mercenary
by fair means or foul/by hook or by crook/unscrupulously
bottomless pit of desire (idiom); insatiable greed/carnal cravings are never satisfied and are a main obstruction on the path to enlightenment
